overview: It's summer, it's hot, it's sticky, and man does Studio 2000 have a treat for you. Working Stiff is the title, Derek Kent the director, and the star is Studio 2000 exclusive, All-American dreamboat D.C. Chandler. This very tall, raven-haired, sweet-faced, donkey-cocked hunk of flesh-made-fantasy simply took your breath away in SuperCharge and The Scout Club. In Working Stiff he appears in two scenes and gives up his bottom, on camera, for the first time. Yes, you read it right. He gets fucked with the same wide-eyed, “gosh ain't this fun!” enthusiasm that made him an instant Superstar in the first place. Make no mistake, this is an EVENT!
title: Working Stiff
